intro: Enrolling in an all-girls school as the only boy!? A harem academy life where I'm at the mercy of a young lady with almost no knowledge of men is about to begin...!
description:
"Lady & Lonely Boy ～お嬢様とぼっちくん～" is a school comedy visual novel about a protagonist who becomes the only male student at a school attended by young ladies. The story follows him as he teaches the girls, who know nothing about men, what it means to be a man.
A Bishojo Game released in 2013 under the "Swaneye" brand has been reworked for the "PandaShojo" platform for players around the world to enjoy.


◆Synopsis
Holding his sharply aching stomach, Takumi Kiba stopped in front of the school gate.
Even though he was late, why didn't he just go through the gate and head to the classroom?
Because there are girls in the classroom! Girls! Girls! It's only for girls!

Takumi didn't expect that there would be no other male students besides himself, and he ended up feeling isolated at the academy.
While living such a lonely life, Chika Kagei, his childhood friend and the only person he can talk to, invites him to join a club.

The club was called the "Communication Club", commonly known as the "Garden".
As girls' schools became co-educational, it was established to act as a mediator between men and women and to resolve problems between them.
That's what Garden Chairman Hibiki Ayasegawa said.
"Would you like to be friends with us?"

He really wanted male friends.
But for Takumi, who was lonely and wanted to quit the school, these words were the sweetest of all.
Takumi decides to join the Garden.

"Welcome to the Garden!"


◆Characters
・Hibiki Ayasegawa
“We, the female students of this school, have very little interaction with men.”
A young lady who excels academically, is beautiful, comes from a good family, and serves as the head of the Garden.
However, she is arrogant and hates losing, and she even challenges Takumi.
There are many aspects of her that are endearing, such as being somewhat absent-minded and unable to defy Himeko.

・Himeko Ranjou
"Sorry about that. It's the first time a boy has come, so everyone got a bit carried away..."
A polite and stylish young lady, a third-year student like Hibiki, who serves as the student council president.
She is very kind to Takumi and the members of Garden, and everyone looks up to her.
Quite clueless about dirty jokes, and a shy person who turns bright red and says, "That's inappropriate!"

・Yuzu Ogino
"What? What do you mean I don't look like an upperclassman?"
A second-year student who is not good at sitting still and has a rich variety of expressions showing joy, anger, sorrow, and happiness.
For some reason, she often arrives at the clubroom first and end up talking with Takumi until everyone else shows up.
If someone picks a fight with her, she's quick to take the bait, so quarrels suddenly erupt.

・Miyu Sasazuka
"Wearing onions around your neck... or sticking it in your butt is good too ♪"
A natural airhead with outstanding style and a younger sister-like atmosphere.
Like Takumi, she is a first year student who entered this year and got to know him after being introduced to him by Chika.
Innocent and sincere, eager to please, but not very bright.

・Chika Kagei
"Alright! Hey, Miyu~! Let's go buy a new swimsuit~!"
Since long ago, his childhood friend with a peculiar constitution often causes clumsy accidents involving water.
Shre has a good understanding of Takumi and cares about him being lonely.
On the inside she's kind of acts like a man, and has a direty sense of humor that can rival Takumi's.

・Takumi Kiba
"(No, I don't want to...I want to quit the school...)"
The only male student who enrolled in the newly coeducational 'Saint Principal Academy' this year.
In a harem-like state, there is no way to settle into a space where only girls exist.
Just when he was considering dropping out soon after enrolling, he was invited to join the Garden.
